definition: mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向東開去的火車由於信號錯誤而均被取消。

sentences.english: This usually results in the dreaded #2038 error.
sentences.chinese: 通常這會導致可怕的#2038錯誤。

sentences.english: Set the debug option to enable a backtrace when a; problem occurs.
sentences.chinese: 當有問題出現顯示錯誤信息，便於調試。

sentences.english: I accept there were some judicial mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 的確有一些審判方面的錯誤。

sentences.english: There is a discrepancy in the combat log when casting Paladin healing spells.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥記錄當中對騎士的治療記錄有錯誤。

sentences.english: Errors indeed in this virtue of goodness, or charity, may be committed.
sentences.chinese: 但人性中這種仁善的傾向，有時也會犯錯誤。

sentences.english: And then you go forward on that basis.
sentences.chinese: 承認了錯誤，才能繼續前進。

sentences.english: It helps you avoid the mistakes people made in the past.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以幫助你避免犯前人犯過的錯誤。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她對男人們沒有信心，知道他們總要犯錯誤的。

sentences.english: However, asynchronous interaction pushes more complex error handling onto the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，異步交互將更復雜的錯誤處理推給了用戶。

sentences.english: RemoteException - Thrown when the method failed due to a system-level failure.
sentences.chinese: 方法拋出該異常表示一個由系統級錯誤引起的失敗。

sentences.english: This error will disappear after the main program has been defined.
sentences.chinese: 在您完成主程序的定義之後，該錯誤將會消失。

sentences.english: It would be a complete mistake to decry love of power altogether as a motive.
sentences.chinese: 反對對權力的迷戀是人們的動機之一是個徹底的錯誤。

sentences.english: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.chinese: 教授嚴厲批評了我的粗心錯誤。

sentences.english: The worst personal development mistake didn't make the list.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把最糟糕的個人發展錯誤列進表裏。

sentences.english: Lots of errors but we've seen this error before.
sentences.chinese: 很多錯誤，但是這條，我們之前見過。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
